title: Realspace® Magellan 59"W Manager's Computer Desk, Blonde Ash
descriptions:
Upgrade your workspace with the Realspace® Magellan 59"W Manager’s Computer Desk in Blonde Ash—where modern style meets everyday performance. With a generous 59-inch work surface, this desk gives you room to spread out your laptop, dual monitors, and paperwork, while its warm, Blonde Ash finish adds a polished, professional look to any home office or workplace.

Thoughtfully designed storage keeps you organized and clutter-free:
- Slide-out keyboard tray for ergonomic comfort and extra desktop space.
- 4 total drawers, including 3 box drawers for office supplies and a full-size file drawer to keep documents within easy reach.

Built to handle busy days, the durable medium-density fiberboard construction features a protective paper laminate that resists scratches and water spills—ideal for daily use. The desk meets ANSI/BIFMA performance standards for quality you can trust.

Additional details you’ll appreciate:
- Recommended for home or professional settings.
- Sturdy, substantial design; may require two people to handle during setup.
- Assembly required; in-home assembly service available at 866-388-4350.

Elevate productivity and style with the Realspace® Magellan Manager’s Desk—your dependable, elegant centerpiece for getting things done.
